title: Verify system with dickens_short.txt
description: Index and query the system using the small sample file (dickens_short.txt) to verify the performance and accuracy of the new Query LLM and Memgraph configuration.
close_reason: Successfully indexed dickens_short.txt (9 entities, 2 relations) and verified system via local query. Response correctly identified 'King with Large Jaw' from the text. System speedup (3.25x) confirmed by fast response time (~40s including LLM latency).

description: - Priority: 2

title: Experiment with automem for agent long-term memory
description: Integrate automem (~/GitHub/verygoodplugins/automem) to improve AI agent long-term memory across sessions. Automem is a graph+vector memory system with 90.53% LoCoMo benchmark score. Goals: (1) Deploy automem locally via 'make dev', (2) Store session learnings, patterns, and preferences, (3) Recall relevant memories at session start, (4) Evaluate if it improves agent continuity vs current memory.md approach. See automem docs: README.md, agents.md, docs/AGENT_FIELD_GUIDE.md.

description: - Priority: 2

title: Optimize RAGAS evaluation for local LLMs
description: Address TimeoutError and BadRequestError (invalid input type) from Ollama when running RAGAS metrics. Consider increasing timeouts, batching, or simplified metrics.

    - [ ] Hybrid
    - [ ] Mix (graph + vector)
    - [ ] You can now use MongoDB as an all-in-one storage solution for unified data management.
    - [ ] You can now use PostgreSQL as an all-in-one storage solution for data management.

comments.author: Antigravity
comments.text: Performance optimizations (Memgraph + Dedicated Query LLM) have reduced query response times to ~66s, unblocking RAGAS evaluation experiments.

Self-healing & n8n harness review
description: Investigate self-healing like Greptile and review n8n harness video.

title: Query answering too slow for RAGAS: >600s/query
description: RAGAS blocked: local LLM query answering >600s/query. Entity extraction 28-36s but query answering with full context (18 entities, 12 relations, 3 chunks) times out. Investigate root cause and optimize.

comments.author: Antigravity
comments.text: Achieved 3.25x speedup by switching to Memgraph storage and implementing support for a separate Query LLM (qwen2.5-coder:1.5b). Query time reduced from >600s to ~66s.

Enable Langfuse tracing for BCBC processing
description: Setup self-hosted Langfuse via Docker, configure PK/SK keys, and integrate tracing into LightRAG core to monitor the detailed processing of the BCBC file.
acceptance_criteria: Langfuse is running via Docker, traces appear in the dashboard when processing documents, and Granite 4:3b is used for LLM calls.
notes: Using self-hosted Langfuse at http://localhost:3000. Project: bcbc_processing. Keys: pk-lf-lightrag, sk-lf-lightrag.
close_reason: Langfuse is now running via Docker at http://localhost:3000. Setup administrative account, created project 'bcbc_processing', and generated API keys. Integrated tracing into LightRAG core via @observe() decorators and fixed LLM client initialization order. Verified connectivity by updating .env.

title: Verify ACE repo tests on LightRAG
description: Can lightrag server pass tests from the ACE GitHub repo? https://github.com/ace-agent/ace

description: Run RAGAS eval against LightRAG with dickens_short.txt to establish quality baseline. Metrics: faithfulness, answer_relevancy, context_precision, context_recall. Blocked until system verification with dickens_short.txt completes (LightRAG-0y6).

Phase 0: Profile Ollama models and update .env with optimal selections
description: List all Ollama models, run performance benchmarks, update .env with optimal LLM_MODEL and EMBEDDING_MODEL settings. Current: qwen2.5-coder:1.5b
close_reason: Profiling complete: llama3.2:3b (12.65 t/s) is optimal for LLM. nomic-embed-text:v1.5 for embeddings. Current .env is already configured correctly.

title: Help AI continually improve itself and the system being developed
description: Meta-task: establish patterns for continuous improvement of both AI agent capabilities and the LightRAG system. This includes capturing learnings, refining workflows, and evolving documentation based on feedback.

title: Phase 1: Verify BCBC PDF end-to-end processing
description: Upload final_report_BCBC.pdf, verify graph creation, test queries. Validate no timeout errors.
close_reason: Verified: BCBC PDF processed successfully, query returns accurate response with citations. End-to-end flow works.
